WHERE USER_ID = ? AND CHARACTER_NAME = ?
UPDATE LIFE_CHARACTER SET MONEY = ?, STOCK_COUNT = ?, STOCK_VALUE = ? WHERE USER_ID = ? AND CHARACTER_NAME = ?
SELECT PRICE FROM STOCK WHERE CHARACTER_ID = ?
UPDATE STOCK SET PRICE = ? WHERE CHARACTER_ID = ?
INSERT INTO STOCK(CHARACTER_ID, PRICE) VALUES(?, DEFAULT)
UPDATE LIFE_CHARACTER SET MONEY = ?, HAS_APARTMENT = ?, HAS_BUILDING = ?, HAS_HOTEL = ? WHERE USER_ID = ? AND CHARACTER_NAME = ?

SELECT CHARACTER_ID, CHARACTER_NAME, USER_ID, AGE, MONEY, INTELLIGENCE, STAMINA, LUCK, PART_TIME_EXP, EMPLOYEE_EXP, EXECUTIVE_EXP, ENTREPRENEUR_EXP, LABORER_EXP, SUPERVISOR_EXP, TRAINER_EXP, ATHLETE_EXP, STOCK_COUNT, HAS_APARTMENT, HAS_BUILDING, HAS_HOTEL FROM LIFE_CHARACTER WHERE CHARACTER_ID = ?
UPDATE LIFE_CHARACTER SET MONEY = ?, INTELLIGENCE = ?, STAMINA = ?, LUCK = ? WHERE USER_ID = ? AND CHARACTER_NAME = ?
SELECT USER_ID, CHARACTER_NAME, MONEY, STOCK_VALUE, (MONEY + STOCK_VALUE) AS TOTAL_ASSET FROM LIFE_CHARACTER ORDER BY TOTAL_ASSET DESC

SELECT al.ACHIEVEMENT_ID, al.ACHIEVEMENT_TITLE, al.ACHIEVEMENT_DESCRIBE, ua.IS_ACHIEVE FROM ACHIEVEMENT_LIST al JOIN USER_ACHIEVEMENT ua ON al.ACHIEVEMENT_ID = ua.ACHIEVEMENT_ID WHERE ua.USER_ID = ? ORDER BY al.ACHIEVEMENT_ID
INSERT INTO USER_ACHIEVEMENT (ACHIEVEMENT_ID, USER_ID, IS_ACHIEVE) SELECT ACHIEVEMENT_ID, ?, 0 FROM ACHIEVEMENT_LIST
UPDATE USER_ACHIEVEMENT SET IS_ACHIEVE = 1 WHERE USER_ID = ? AND ACHIEVEMENT_ID = ?
SELECT IS_ACHIEVE FROM ACHIEVEMENT_LIST al JOIN USER_ACHIEVEMENT ua ON al.ACHIEVEMENT_ID = ua.ACHIEVEMENT_ID WHERE ua.USER_ID = ? AND al.ACHIEVEMENT_ID = ?
